description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Buccaneers and Marooners of America ... Edited by H. Pyle. [Containing The History of the Buccaneers of America by A. O. E. Edited from the first English edition.]]" Author: EXQUEMELIN, Alexander Olivier. Contributor: Powell, Henry. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9555.f.8." Page: 390 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: Sonnenschein & Co. Edition: [Another edition.] The Buccaneers of America, ... Now faithfully rendered into English. With facsimiles of all the original engravings, etc. (Reprinted from the edition of 1684, to which is added a reprint of the ... fourth part by B. Ringrose, 1685, ... Edited, with an introduction by H. Powell.). Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001184742 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
